price: (Yaa Muhammad SAW!) jedhi: "wanti ani gabbaru Gooftaa kiyya qofa; Isattii waan tokkollee hin qindeessu."
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā adʿū rabbī walā ush'riku bihi aḥadan
